title: Classic Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Boil the spaghetti in salted water according to package directions.
While the pasta cooks, fry the pancetta in a pan over medium heat until crisp.
In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg yolks and Pecorino cheese. Season generously with black pepper.
Drain the pasta, reserving a cup of the pasta water.
Quickly toss the hot pasta in the pan with the pancetta. Remove from heat.
Pour the egg and cheese mixture over the pasta, stirring quickly to create a creamy sauce. If it's too thick, add a little reserved pasta water.
Serve immediately with an extra grating of cheese and pepper.

title: Thai Green Chicken Curry
ingredients: 1 lb chicken breasts, cut into chunks
instructions: In a large pot or wok, bring half of the coconut milk to a simmer.
Add the green curry paste and cook for 1 minute until fragrant.
Add the chicken and cook until it's no longer pink.
Pour in the remaining coconut milk, fish sauce, and sugar. Bring to a boil.
Add the bamboo shoots and red bell pepper. Reduce heat and simmer for 5-7 minutes, until vegetables are tender-crisp.
Garnish with fresh basil leaves before serving.
Serve hot with jasmine rice.

title: Hearty Vegan Lentil Soup
ingredients: 1 cup brown or green lentils, rinsed
instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat.
Add the onion, carrots, and celery and cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes.
Stir in the minced garlic and cook for another minute until fragrant.
Add the rinsed lentils, vegetable broth, thyme, and bay leaf.
Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and let it simmer for 40-50 minutes, until lentils are tender.
Remove the bay leaf before serving.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.

title: classic spaghetti carbonara
instructions: Boil pasta.
Fry bacon.
Mix eggs and cheese.
Combine everything.
